fields.description: Required. URL used to launch the activity in the best native experience represented by the appId. Might launch a web-based app if no native app exists.
fields.name: ActivationUrl

fields.description: Required. URL for the domain representing the cross-platform identity mapping for the app. Mapping is stored either as a JSON file hosted on the domain or configurable via Windows Dev Center. The JSON file is named cross-platform-app-identifiers and is hosted at root of your HTTPS domain, either at the top level domain or include a sub domain. For example: https://contoso.com or https://myapp.contoso.com but NOT https://myapp.contoso.com/somepath. You must have a unique file and domain (or sub domain) per cross-platform app identity. For example, a separate file and domain is needed for Word vs. PowerPoint.
fields.name: ActivitySourceHost

fields.description: Required. The unique activity ID in the context of the app - supplied by caller and immutable thereafter.
fields.name: AppActivityId

fields.description: Optional. Short text description of the app used to generate the activity for use in cases when the app is not installed on the userâ€™s local device.
fields.name: AppDisplayName

fields.description: Optional. Used in the event the content can be rendered outside of a native or web-based app experience (for example, a pointer to an item in an RSS feed).
fields.name: ContentUrl

fields.description: Set by the server. DateTime in UTC when the object was created on the server.
fields.name: CreatedDateTime

fields.description: Set by the server. DateTime in UTC when the object expired on the server.
fields.name: ExpirationDateTime

fields.description: Optional. URL used to launch the activity in a web-based app, if available.
fields.name: FallbackUrl

fields.description: Optional. NavigationProperty/Containment; navigation property to the activity's activityHistoryItems.
fields.name: HistoryItems

fields.description: Set by the server. DateTime in UTC when the object was modified on the server.
fields.name: LastModifiedDateTime

fields.description: Set by the server. A status code used to identify valid objects. Values: active, updated, deleted, ignored.
fields.name: Status

fields.description: Optional. The timezone in which the user's device used to generate the activity was located at activity creation time; values supplied as Olson IDs in order to support cross-platform representation.
fields.name: UserTimezone
